projects.title: ChronoSystems
projects.description: A cloud-based platform that enables businesses to efficiently manage employee timesheets and pay stubs, built on a microservice architecture that seamlessly integrates multiple services into a unified, scalable system.

projects.title: Squamish Real Estate Website
projects.description: A commercial website migration from Django to React for a modernized UI, with data infrastructure moved to AWS for scalability and API Gateway endpoints implemented to serve user-facing data insights.

projects.title: Personal Shell
projects.description: A Unix shell written in C with custom shell scripts for task automation, featuring process, filesystem, and memory management, along with support for background execution to enable simultaneous process handling.

projects.title: AI Summarizer
projects.description: An AI text summarizer using a pretrained model from HuggingFace in combination with a login system, an admin page, a documented API, and an API limit for users.

projects.title: SmoothTalk
projects.description: A web application built to help users improve public speaking skills through speech-to-text analysis and real-time detection of filler words, using Node.js and WebSocket for seamless audio streaming to Amazon Transcribe.

projects.title: Stonks
projects.description: A simple web application with customized trading algorithms of low, medium, and high risk tolerance levels to automate stock trading for users.
